alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 1:17AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southwestern Rockingham...eastern Cheshire and Hillsborough Counties... At 117 AM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from Roxbury to near Haverhill...and moving south AT 45 MPH. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Nashua, Derry, Keene, Jaffrey, Merrimack, Salem, Bedford, Milford, Amherst, Litchfield, Hollis, Swanzey, Peterborough, New Boston, Antrim, Mont Vernon, Greenfield, Lyndeborough and Dublin. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 14. This also includes... Mount Monadnock and North Pack Monadnock. * Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough
